Question
========

The time school students spend on sports per week has a normal distribution with a mean of 20.5 hours and a standard deviation of 5.5 hours. What then is the percentage of students who spend less than 27 hours spent on sports?

Answerlist
----------

* 20,4%
* 26,8%
* 76%
* 88,1%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 20,4%: Incorrect
* 26,8%: Incorrect
* 76%: Incorrect
* 88,1%: Correct
